hero.title: Create Powerful
hero.subtitle: Build reusable form templates, get real-time analytics, and manage responses with enterprise-grade features. The modern form builder for teams that ship.

features.title: Everything you need to build
features.subtitle: From simple surveys to complex data collection, FormMaster provides enterprise-grade features in an intuitive package that teams love to use.

cta.text: Ready to experience the next generation of form builders?

templates.title: Template-Based System
templates.description: Create reusable question templates with multiple input types - text, numbers, checkboxes, and multiple choice.

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Get instant insights with beautiful charts, aggregated results, and comprehensive data visualization.

accessControl.title: Advanced Access Control
accessControl.description: Manage permissions with public forms, restricted access, and comprehensive admin controls.

search.title: Full-text Search
search.description: Find any form instantly by content, tags, authors, or any text within your forms and responses.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop Interface
dragDrop.description: Reorder questions visually with an intuitive interface that makes form building effortless.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in support for English and Spanish with easy localization for global teams.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Automatic email copies of responses sent to users, keeping everyone in the loop.

social.title: Social Features
social.description: Comments, likes, and social interactions make forms more engaging and collaborative.

mobile.title: Mobile Responsive
mobile.description: Perfect experience across all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile optimized.

auth.title: GitHub & Discord Auth
auth.description: Seamless social authentication - no complex signups, just connect and start building.

performance.title: Lightning Fast
performance.description: Built with modern tech stack for blazing fast performance and instant loading.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Ready
enterprise.description: Scalable architecture with MySQL, Cloudflare R2, and AWS infrastructure.

howItWorks.title: From idea to insights in
howItWorks.subtitle: FormMaster makes it incredibly easy to go from concept to collecting valuable data. No technical skills required, just your creativity.

demo.title: Try the Form Builder
demo.subtitle: Experience our intuitive drag-and-drop form builder. Add questions, customize types, and see how easy it is to create professional forms.

create.title: Create Your Template
create.description: Start with our drag-and-drop builder. Add questions, customize styling, and set up validation rules. Save as a reusable template.

share.title: Share & Collect
share.description: Share your form via link or embed. Set access controls, enable social auth, and watch responses come in real-time.

analyze.title: Analyze & Insights
analyze.description: Get instant analytics with beautiful charts. Export data, track trends, and make data-driven decisions effortlessly.

brand.name: FormMaster
brand.description: The modern form builder for teams that ship. Create powerful forms with enterprise-grade features.

company.title: Company

rating.question: How would you rate our service?

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about your visit, which can make it easier to visit the site again and make the site more useful to you.

howWeUseCookies.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: FormMaster uses cookies to enhance your experience and provide essential functionality:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization based on your interactions.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies to provide functionality or analytics:

managingCookies.title: 5. Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. However, if you limit the ability of websites to set cookies, you may worsen your overall user experience.

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

cookieRetention.title: 6. Cookie Retention
cookieRetention.content: Different types of cookies have different lifespans:
list: Session cookies: Deleted when you close your browser
Persistent cookies: Remain for a set period (usually 30 days to 1 year)
Authentication cookies: Last until you log out

updates.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using FormMaster, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: FormMaster is a web-based form building platform that allows users to create, share, and manage forms and collect responses. The service includes features such as:

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts and Registration
userAccounts.content: To use certain features of our service, you must register and create an account. You agree to:
list: Provide accurate and complete registration information
Keep your login credentials secure and confidential
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
Take responsibility for all activities under your account

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use FormMaster to:
list: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Collect sensitive personal information without consent
Distribute spam, malware, or harmful content
Interfere with or disrupt our services

contentOwnership.title: 5. Content and Data Ownership
contentOwnership.content: You retain ownership of all content and data you create or upload to FormMaster. By using our service, you grant us a limited license to process, store, and display your content as necessary to provide the service.

serviceAvailability.title: 6. Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content: While we strive to maintain high availability, we do not guarantee that our service will be available 100% of the time. We may experience downtime for maintenance, updates, or unforeseen circumstances.

limitationOfLiability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: FormMaster shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: When you use FormMaster, we collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, build forms, or contact our support team.
list: Form data and responses you create or submit
Communication data when you contact us

howWeUseInformation.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including:
list: Providing and maintaining the FormMaster service
Processing and storing your forms and responses
Sending you technical notices and support messages
Improving our service and developing new features

informationSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy:
list: To protect our rights and safety
With trusted service providers who assist our operations

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes:
list: Encryption of data in transit and at rest

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. We will delete your information upon account deletion, except where we are required to retain it by law.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:
